message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to keep my spending within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $150?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraint, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you a price of $165. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still hoping to keep my expenses lower. Could we possibly come to an agreement at $150?
